item.title: When a spouse dies, there can be a ‘tax explosion’ for the one left behind
item.description: If you know what’s coming, you can plan ahead to mitigate some of the pain.

item.title: Starbucks’s turnaround plan under new CEO now likely includes job cuts
item.description: Coffee chain Starbucks’s promised overhaul may require cutting jobs as it tries to work more efficiently, CEO Brian Niccol said.

item.title: T-bill supply will turn negative soon without a U.S. debt-limit deal: BofA
